name: The Queen makeover !!!
description:
She can be a real beauty, a queen of all red carpets... with the proper helping hand! And a complete makeover is just the kind of help she needs and you are the one who can give her the makeover she needs.
With you make-up artist skills and with all these facial treatments, followed by a gorgeously glamorous makeup and a highly fashionable outfit...this common girl will just become a model! Get it started, use all of those facial treatments in order to obtain a smooth complexion required for a flawless make up and then create a daring makeup look for her. Choose her a new hairstyle as well, glam her up with sparkling jewelries and then go to the next page of the game and see which outfit from the ones available in her wardrobe will best complete her chic model look. Enjoy it!
